Any advise ?

Hi,

If you want to open an existing word document and modify it, then it will be difficult for you to do it with phpWord. What you can do is to open that document as html , do whatever you want and then re-create the word document. But, PHPWord does not provide any functionality for the first part i.e converting to html. You can take help of open office which provides a functionality like this. 


Regards,
Swarnendu
